description.short: Initial Program Loader for R_CarM3 reference board
description.abstract: The ipl-R_CarM3 program is responsible for the first stage initialization of the R_CarM3 reference board, including initialization of the memory controller, and setting up a serial port for debug purposes. It then scans for a QNX IFS (Image File System) image, and copies that image to memory. Finally, it transfers control to the QNX startup-R_CarM3 module, which is located at the beginning of the IFS image.
